Package com.heshustle.game

Class GameCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.heshustle.game.GameCharacter
  • public class GameCharacter
extends java.lang.Object

    Class that deals with all character functions, specifically:

    • Keeping track of the character's position and the direction they're facing.
    • Rendering and animating the character.

    Also implements helper enums and methods for these functions

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  GameCharacter.Direction
      Valid character directions, consisting of:
      GameCharacter.Direction.UP GameCharacter.Direction.DOWN GameCharacter.Direction.LEFT GameCharacter.Direction.RIGHT
      static class  GameCharacter.State
      Valid character states, consisting of:
      GameCharacter.State.IDLE GameCharacter.State.RUNNING

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameCharacter

        public GameCharacter​(java.lang.String idleSheetPath,
                     java.lang.String runSheetPath,
                     java.lang.String characterName)

        Constructor for GameCharacter.

        Parameters:
        idleSheetPath - Relative file path from assets to the idle animation file sheet (.png)
        runSheetPath - Relative file path from assets to the run animation file sheet (.png)
        characterName - String that names the character. Used in character selection menu.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update​(float delta)

        Updates the GameCharacter's sprite based on how much time has elapsed since the last update.

        Parameters:
        delta - Amount of time in seconds that has passed since the last update.

      • render

        public void render​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch,
                   float x,
                   float y,
                   float desiredHeight)
        Renders the sprite via batch
        Parameters:
        batch - Batch to render the sprite to.
        x - X coordinate of bottom left of the sprite.
        y - Y coordinate of bottom left of the sprite.
        desiredHeight - Desired height of the sprite in pixels. (Used for scaling)
        See Also:
        SpriteBatch

      • setState

        public void setState​(GameCharacter.State newState,
                     GameCharacter.Direction newDirection)
        Sets the state and/or direction of the character.
        Parameters:
        newState - New state for the character to be in.
        newDirection - New direction for the character to face.

      • getCurrentDirection

        public GameCharacter.Direction getCurrentDirection()
        Gets the current direction of the GameCharacter.
        Returns:
        The current direction of the GameCharacter.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Disposes unneeded assets. Call when the GameCharacter is no longer being used.
